WRITING.TITLE: How Is Mysteryland (NL) compared to Tomorrowland?
WRITING.TEXT:
So it was my first Tomorrowland and im still speechless because it was so amazing. Im thinking about going to Mysteryland in the Netherland but I have a few questions: I heard they mostly play minimal house and techno is that true? I enjoy all kinds of music but (please dont hate me) I really enjoy the mainstream "EDM" songs you can sing along or tropical house (I saw Sam Feldt is playing there).
Also why is it ending so early at 11pm? That kinda surprised me.

did anyone record the matoma set? :( Hey, we were at tomorrowland and people were like waving their flag and walking hand in hand through the crowd and we even got on the livestream a friend texted me but I cant find it on the internet...does anyone know how I can watch the livestream from yesterday? Or did anybody record it? I would appreciate it so much - also it was my first TML and it were the best three days of my life. thank you for everyone from all over the world for being so nice and so happy and sharing love.
